topics.body:
"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55411cc06368721fa50f0800#post_55411cc06368721fa50f0800
Alright. I'll spoiler it since _some people_ don't wanna hear it.
[spoiler]So Tony makes Ultron Mk. I, a highly intelligent AI. As we see in the trailer, it's pretty fucked up, just a mishmash of parts. Ultron decides to repair itself, since it realized that it's not at optimal capacity.
_And then he gets his hands on an Infinity Gem._
Maybe Vision gives it to him or something, we haven't figured that much out yet.[/spoiler]
topics.author: 5201b5c0a4c72d0d9b0001e4

Anyways, my point still stands. Ultron somehow gets an Infinity Gem, which could also explain how he's so powerful.[/spoiler]
